git submodule add https://github.com/assimp/assimp externals/assimp
git submodule add http://git.savannah.gnu.org/r/freetype/freetype2.git externals/freetype2
git submodule add https://github.com/g-truc/glm externals/glm
git submodule add https://github.com/nothings/stb externals/stb
git submodule add https://github.com/zeux/pugixml/ externals/pugixml
git submodule add git://git.code.sf.net/p/tclap/code externals/tclap
